name: pocketshield-io

scripts.build:apk:debug:install: cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && adb install -r app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk
scripts.build:ipa:debug: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace PocketShieldio.xcworkspace -scheme PocketShieldio -configuration Debug -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath build/PocketShieldio.xcarchive archive
scripts.build:ipa:release: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace PocketShieldio.xcworkspace -scheme PocketShieldio -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath build/PocketShieldio.xcarchive archive
scripts.build:ipa:export: cd ios && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/PocketShieldio.xcarchive -exportPath build/ipa -exportOptionsPlist ExportOptions.plist
scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -workspace PocketShieldio.xcworkspace -scheme PocketShieldio
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:android && npm run clean:ios && rm -rf node_modules && npm install
scripts.dev:android: npm run build:apk:debug:install && adb logcat | grep -E '(PocketShield|ReactNative|Expo)'
scripts.dev:ios: npm run build:ipa:debug && xcrun simctl install booted ios/build/PocketShieldio.app

description: Advanced Android security monitoring and threat detection app
author: PocketShield.io Team
